overview:
Warren Jolly is a 25-year old, serial Internet Entrepreneur.

Dynamic internet marketing professional with extensive upper-level management experience. Began career in online marketing as an affiliate marketer and then co-founded Nebulant Corporation, a leading B2B internet solutions provider, servicing clients worldwide. More than 7 years of leadership experience in building global Internet brands and internationally respected as a performance-marketing expert.

Presently CEO of Affiliate Media Inc., a media company specializing in the online affiliate marketing space consisting of a publishing division, agency, and conference circuit. Fueled over 1000% growth in the company in the past 3 years through innovative solutions, recruiting top-notch talent, and effective management strategies.

Member of the Young Entrepreneur’s Organization, Association for Corporate Growth and Direct Marketing Association.

external_links.title: Affiliate Media receives 2008 Presidential Award from MAP
